subject: Re: Order #SSN4081, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,

I’m super happy with the product, and definitely gonna write the best
review.
There is only one thing that is missing. The plate for the haptic clutch
that should go to the left side. So I was not able to mount it properly.
Any chance you could send me this plate pleases?
I have attached this pictures.




Michal Zuziak
M-Videography | Based in Iceland


<https://www.mvideography.com/>  <info@mvideography.com>
<https://www.instagram.com/mvideographyiceland/>
<https://www.facebook.com/mvideographyiceland>






On Fri, 19 Dec 2025 at 16:41, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Michal, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi M Videography,  I am sorry for it, We will ship missed item ASAP.

Thank you. I appreciate it


Michal Zuziak
M-Videography | Based in Iceland


<https://www.mvideography.com/>  <info@mvideography.com>
